title: Change Billing Cycle Date
description: A customer requests to change their monthly billing date to align with their payday.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their current billing cycle date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and notes their bill is due on the 15th.

tasks.description: Check available billing cycle dates and explain how a change will affect the next bill (prorated charges).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent explains that changing to the 1st of the month will result in a one-time prorated bill.

tasks.description: Update the account with the new billing cycle date as requested by the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully changes the billing date in the system.
